title: Mila Kunis wraps up warm for fall in shearling jean jacket
text:
Mila Kunis stepped out with a fresh face and a wide grin during an outing with her two-year-old son Dimitri in Beverly Hills.

The That 70s Show vet kept her hair pulled into a messy bun and donned an oversize sherpa-lined denim jacket over a white T-shirt for the Tuesday outing.

Kunis, 36, wore roomy cocoa-colored sweats on the bottom as well as a pair of Converse sneakers.

Natural: Mila Kunis stepped out with a fresh face and a wide grin Tuesday on the streets of Beverly Hills alongside her two-year-old son Dimitri

Her sighting comes as she recently admitted that she wouldn't mind being a cast member on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills one day.

Kunis revealed her husband Ashton Kutcher's reaction to the prospect on comedian Andrea Savage's Grown-Up Woman podcast.

'I did ask my husband once, I was like, Listen. Later, in like 20 years, 30 years, what do you think of me going on Real Housewives of Beverly Hills? I’m like, just for like, a year. He was like … "I would kill you,"' she said.

Carefree: The That 70s Show vet kept her hair pulled into a messy bun and donned an oversize sherpa-lined denim jacket over a white T-shirt for the outing

In addition to Dimitri, Kutcher and Kunis share five-year-old daughter Wyatt.

She and Kutcher met on the set of That 70s Show when she was only 14 and he was 19, playing love interests on-screen.

Kunis even had her first kiss with Kutcher while filming the show as the attitudinal Jackie to his heartthrob Kelso.

Throwback: She and Kutcher met on the set of That 70s Show when she was only 14 and he was 19, playing love interests on-screen

Though they had chemistry, it took years before their relationship turned romantic.

Kutcher was married to fellow actress Demi Moore from 2005 to 2011.

And earlier that same year, Kunis went her separate ways from Home Alone star Macaulay Culkin, whom she had dated since 2002.

In the beginning, the two decided to keep things casual, but eventually realized that something more serious was brewing.

Lovebirds: In addition to Dimitri, Kutcher and Kunis share five-year-old daughter Wyatt

Mila explained to Howard Stern on Sirius XM: 'We started dating with the idea we both were never going to get married. He had just got out of a marriage and I had gotten out of a relationship.

'We shook hands on it and life was great. But we were in agreement that it was just fun. And three months later, I was like, "This isn't just fun anymore."'

'And then a year later we wanted to get married. I think it took everyone by surprise.'

The two were wed in July 2015.
